DOC.brief_summary: Sixty volunteer mean age 21,8 Â± 2,6 year participate study , randomly distribute one follow group : control , Kinesio tap group tension anterior arm region Kinesio tap group without tension region . All subject underwent eccentric exercise protocol three evaluation : protocol , immediately 48h protocol . The following variable analyze : sensation pain primary outcome ; peak torque normalize body weight ; average peak torque ; total work average power , use isokinetic dynamometer . In addition , muscle activation amplitude ( Root Mean Square ) median frequency record use surface electromyography .
DOC.brief_title: Kinesio Taping Muscle Damage Response Induced Eccentric Exercise
DOC.criteria: Female 18 28 year ; BMI 30 ; Practicing recreational physical activity least three time week without train competitive level ; Exhibiting shoulder joint , elbow nondominant hand integrity ; Do history osteomyoarticular injury assess limb last 6 month . Does run test properly ; Be allergic tape test ; Does attend assessment .
